message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $12,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is really the lowest I can go. This product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
